563980.name: Modbox Demo
563980.description:
Modbox is a VR sandbox where you can use mods to create game experiences and share them online.

Go online to play multiplayer creations together in a variety of game modes - or create your own game worlds by piecing parts together.

The free demo lets you play all of the Featured Creations in the workshop.

Select from a large selection of mods to choose content for your creations
Check out tutorials and our wiki at http://www.modboxgame.com/ on how to build
Share your work on Steam workshop ingame, or try out others online
Construct with primitives by just touching them together. Add in hinge joints, ropes, propellers, rockets, piston, balloons. Then control them by wiring them together with throttles and levers.
Pick up and play with toys to interact with the world - including baseball bats, basketballs, crossbows, pistols, chainsaws...
563980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
